name: Beacons
description: A warp-capable species called the Pupaians reach out with a unique request - to help one of their own reach a black hole as a way of transcending this life. Help them safely reach the black hole - without getting pulled in yourself.
rules:
-- Unique Federation, Klingon Empire and Section 31 Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using M'Benga, Hemmer, Pike, or Inspiring crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: M'Benga, Hemmer, Pike, or Inspiring
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Una
featured_crew.flavor: Una is a talented helmsman (and singer) serving as First Officer under Captain Pike on the USS Enterprise.

featured_crew.name: Hemmer
featured_crew.flavor: Hemmer is the Chief Engineer of the USS Enterprise under Captain Pike. He will not fight for Starfleet, but he will defend its ideals.

featured_crew.name: Pike
featured_crew.flavor: Looking for a source of power for the Red Angel suit, Pike seeks answers on Boreth.

rewards.name: Federation Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

rewards.name: Klingon Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Section 31 Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Section 31 faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Sisko
rewards.flavor: Promoted to Captain, Benjamin Sisko was recognized for his accomplishments as Commander of Deep Space Nine.

rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Una
rewards.flavor: Una is a talented helmsman (and singer) serving as First Officer under Captain Pike on the USS Enterprise.

rewards.name: Pike
rewards.flavor: Looking for a source of power for the Red Angel suit, Pike seeks answers on Boreth.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Create a new camaraderie with the Klingon Empire.

potential_rewards.name: Klingon Empire Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Hello, Captain. Got a unique assignment for you today. A warp-capable species, the Pupaians, have reached out to the Federation for assistance on their species' sacred voyage. Their final voyage, to be specific."

"Reminiscent of the Vhnori, the Pupaians value control over their own passing, whenever possible. Many Pupaians near the end of their biological life elect to take this voyage, in which they make peace with this life before reaching their final destination - a black hole."

"...where they believe they will find their next life. As a doctor, the thought of guiding someone to what is likely their death is difficult. And yet, that is what we are being asked to do, as Pupaians making their final voyage are being attacked en route by unknown assailants."
"Yes. I'm sure you have some complex feelings on this one, Captain, as we all do. But we can't ignore a call for our help like this. Meet with the Pupaians and give them a helping hand."
